data.homeworkTitle: 第二章第十节自发性气胸

questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"气管插管","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"剖胸探查","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"封闭伤口固定胸壁","IsAnswer":true},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"应用抗生素、吸氧","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":4,"Content":"闭式胸膜腔引流","IsAnswer":false}]

questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"胸壁有伤口","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"气管心脏移向健侧","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"伤侧胸部叩诊呈鼓音","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"听诊呼吸音消失或减弱","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":4,"Content":"听到空气进出胸膜腔的声音","IsAnswer":true}]

questions.title: 张力性气胸急救时首先应
questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"在伤侧锁骨中线第二肋间进行胸膜强穿刺，尽快排气减压","IsAnswer":true},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"迅速封闭胸壁伤口","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"清创","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"气管切开","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":4,"Content":"加压吸氧","IsAnswer":false}]
